body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips Tumacácori is a fantastic outdoor classroom!  Come to explore topics in history, science, engineering, art, agriculture, diplomacy, and more.  You are limited only by your imagination. All Field Trips   New Field Trip! Mission Mystery Learn More     Curriculum Materials Investigate Tumacácori's story from the comfort of your own classroom or computer lab.  These lessons also make great pre- or post-trip enrichment. All Curriculum Materials   Primary source jackpot! Investigate Mission 2000 Records Learn More     Guest Speakers Are you a school in Santa Cruz County looking for a little bit of Tumacácori to come to you?  Ranger-led classroom programs, assemblies, or tables may be available by request. All Guest Speakers
title: Tumacácori National Historical Park: Parks as Classrooms
